Real Estate Paralegal

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vel ultrices auctor sed lorem augue. Placerat ultrices eget amet gravida. Tellus lacus dolor.

Apply Now
York Office

Barley Snyder, a regional law firm with more than 100 attorneys, seeks a real estate paralegal in our York office. Duties will include maintaining and supporting activities of commercial and residential real estate closings, which include completing assigned closing tasks, reviewing and preparing drafts of closing documents -- including accurate closing disclosures and settlement statements -- and handling post-closing matters and file management. Additional duties may also be assigned commensurate with skill and experience. The individual must be willing to travel across our regional office footprint. Two or four-year college degree preferred, or appropriate experience may be substituted for education.

Work Life Benefits

Employee Assistance Program

The firm offers a program to provide employees and their family members with assistance for any personal or family problem. Services are available by appointment at confidential facilities within our region.

Paid Time Off

Our lawyers are treated as professionals and, as such, the firm does not track your vacation time. The firm also encourages attorneys to utilize this time to ensure a balance between work and family.

Parking

Free parking is provided by the firm at all offices.

Family Leave Time

Associates can receive up to 12 weeks of paid caregiver time for the birth or adoption of a child or placement of a foster child. This time does not have an impact on bonus or partnership consideration. To see an extended explanation of the family leave time policies, click here.

Paid Holidays

The firm has 10 paid holidays per calendar year.

Cell Phone Reimbursement

Attorneys are eligible for up to $100 off the purchase price of one mobile device. The firm will reimburse an attorney up to $110 per month for mobile device usage for their primary device.

Community Service

The firm highly encourages community involvement from our attorneys, especially in leadership roles and nonprofit organizations throughout our footprint. The firm allots a large pool of resources each year to help those nonprofit organizations our attorneys are involved with advance their charitable efforts.

BarleyFit

Health and wellness is a priority at the firm and that includes weekly produce delivery at each office, an annual health fair, quarterly fitness competitions and free, voluntary biometric screenings for all employees.
